name: 3 Layers of Hell
description:
Project 90's fps or 3 Layers of Hell is a 90's styled fps game inspired by classic games like Doom, Quake and Half-life in addition to modern games like Dusk, Amid Evil, Prodeus, Doom 2016 and Doom Eternal. 

  • Currently the game contains two levels, three different enemy types and three weapons.
  • Player can dash and high jump. Both abilities are useful when platforming and fighting demonic forces. 

If you have improvement suggestions leave a comment or answer a couple of questions that we have created for you in google forms.

Feedback form
